name: Enigma Awaken
storyline: It is the year 2026. AI has taken your job, and like the majority of your generation, you are now desperate, until… a tech billionaire recruits you for a secret mission. You must uncover a hidden civilization that disappeared thousands of years ago and retrieve a cosmic stone for him. If you succeed, he will make you richer than you can imagine.
summary: You are a mercenary hired by a billionaire to retrieve an ancient artifact from a lost civilization. Explore diverse landscapes, solve complex puzzles, and engage in thrilling action. This solo-developed, AI-assisted game offers a rich story with surprising events and stunning visuals.
